
snap(20,-30,-60)
sky(200,227,255)
fog(220,223,200)
clouds(191,235,255,3,-1031)
ground(201,204,183)
texture(0,0,0,51)
fadefrom(7000)
density(6)
mountains(6116)

name(The Mad Party)

nlaps(10)

set(48,0,0,0)p
set(15,0,5600,0)p
set(15,0,11200,0)p
set(15,0,16800,0)p
set(20,0,22400,0)p
set(14,0,26950,-90)p
chk(40,-1750,26950,90)
set(14,-3500,26950,0)p
set(10,-3500,22400,0)p
set(10,-3500,16800,0)p
set(10,-3500,11200,0)p
set(10,-3500,5600,0)p
set(20,-3500,0,0)p
set(17,0,-4550,180)p
chk(42,-1750,-4550,90)
set(33,0,11200,180)
set(32,-3500,11200,180)
set(17,-3500,-4550,90)p
